quote_last: Prof. Preobrazhensky commenced the first operation of its kind to be performed in Europe: removal under anaesthesia of a dog’s testicles and their replacement by implanted human testes, with appendages and seminal ducts, taken from a 28-year-old human male
title: The Heart of a Dog
author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quote_first: Ransom took out his watch, which he had adapted, on purpose, several hours before, to Boston time, and saw that the minutes had sped with increasing velocity during this interview, and that it now marked
title: The Bostonians
author: Henry James

quote_last: now,” I said to Drake. “You’d better go straight off and organise a flashing party. There’s not a hope of a sortie tonight at sea, but we’d better be on the safe side.”
title: Eight Hours from England
author: Anthony Quayle
